inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of type 1 diabetes >1 year prior to consent date
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age 7-17 years at the initiation of the system
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Multiple Daily Injections (Basal Bolus therapy) with Total daily insulin use of great than 8.0 units per day over a 1-week period
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Will be clinically able to start the AHCL system
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: History of 3 clinic visits in the last year
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: DKA in the 6 months prior to screening visit
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: patient reports no nausea, vomiting, or abdominal discomfort

exclusion.criterion: Untreated diabetes retinopathy, or other causes that ,in the investigator's opinion, precludes the individual from participating in the trial.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has had previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis, but appears well and is not experiencing any symptoms at this time.
